Posts.Content:
terr...Welcome to hw forum, a great place to come. You will find members here are so helpful and uplifting. Try not to stress to much until you go back. Give yourself permission not to think about
 it until 12/6. I will keep you in my prayers. Be positive and please post and let us know how you are doing.
Bless you, Amy
Chronic Pain(nerve), fibro, mild depression and a few others
Posts.Title: Called Back Scared.....

Posts.Content:
I wish I could think of the right thing to say, well here goes.....take a deep breath in and out. Try to think positive thoughts. Don't panic yet it maybe just that, the films may not have turned out, that happened to my sister in law last year and it was truely just that the films from her right breast did not turn out. So just put it to the back of your mind until your appointment day and then allow yourself to think about
 it, if it tries to haunt you sooner just say to yourself "I am not thinking about
 this today". I hope this helps some. Keep in touch and let me know how it goes....In the meantime you are in my prayers.
Bless you and take care, Amy
Chronic pain(nerve), fibro and mild depression
Posts.Title: Call back and I am freaking out!!!
